tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited for high fever. ****** ** **** ************** After the diagnosis it was the same infection which doctor was suspecting. Medicines prescribed were not very costly and was stopped soon after the cure.I am thankful to the doctor for the treatment.Special thanks to nurses and housekeeping staffs who are working round the clock to take care and keep the hospital very neat and clean.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Suberb dignosed and line of treatment Very much understanding  level of dr. And staff will recommend to my all friends and family

I went to doctor for my chest pain and he told me to go for ultrasound and he found that few 2 mm stones are there in my gall bladder which I was not even aware and that was nit creating any problem for me..but doctor told maybe bcoz of that stones I m having chest pain so pl get it removed...so I have done my surgery get done some where out not in marigoldbut the bad part that even after surgery the pain remains the same..I m totally unhappy with the doctor.******** * * **************** ** ** ******* **** ** ***** *** ** ***** *** *** ** **** **********I don't recommend any one to visit
Visited the doctor for fever and it has been treated really well. Thanks to the doctor for testing us well.

review: Doctor finds the root cause very soon. *** ******* ********** ****** **** ***** Consultation as well as medicine bill was nominal.
